	gender = male
	special = holder

		only_holder = yes
	}
}

### Altaic ###

##Let's make the Chagatai, Ilkhanate, and Golden Hordes properly Khans and not Khagans as they were not equal to the Khagan in Mongolia but the Empires are good to use for gameplay purposes

#########################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################################

## China - I prefer CTP's names over what RoA chose to do. Even if possibly not fully correct I'll take flavorized names over just making everything regular English names since even if you can't properly translate something there's no problem to go with what's closest especially in a game covering such a large timeframe

###############################################
## Chinese Culture Group ##
###############################################

###############################################
## Han Culture

	type = character
	gender = male
	special = holder
	tier = empire
	titles = {
		e_celestia_china
	}
	priority = 103
	governments = { feudal_government administrative_government clan_government tribal_government }
	heritages = { heritage_mongolic heritage_turkic }
}

	name_lists = { name_list_merya name_list_mari name_list_muroma }
	governments = { republic_government }
	flavourization_rules = { 
		top_liege = no
	}
}

#Syria
king_feudal_male_syria = {
	type = character
	gender = male
	special = holder
	tier = kingdom
	priority = 150
	governments = { feudal_government administrative_government clan_government tribal_government }
	heritages = { heritage_arabic heritage_turkic }
	titles = {k_syria }
}

#To make the Ayyubids and Mamluks still call themselves as Sultans. It was definitely an empire but Saladin called himself 'Sultan' since the Caliph was theoretically above him

### Russian ###

#I 100% know I'd annoy people that I put all those other name lists with Russian but I'm not going to make a bunch of variations that are slightly different and it's not like the language was that split yet in 1337 anyway (the only date when the other cultures exist)
baron_male_russian = {
	type = character
	gender = male
	special = holder
	tier = barony
	priority = 103
	name_lists = { name_list_russian name_list_ukrainian name_list_belarusian name_list_great_russian }
	governments = { feudal_government administrative_government clan_government tribal_government }
	flavourization_rules = { 
		top_liege = no
	}
}

	}

###############################################
## Special Titles ###############################################################################################################################################
###############################################


#The original extra flavorization was fine when all of Europe was just in English ie using the word Lord for various places but that doesn't work so well with regional flavorization nor is it reasonable to add 20 different namelist versions of the below titles. I'm just going to use namelists to make the special titles only get used when actually under the rulers/Kingdoms that used those titles with some exceptions

#Make Kingdom Principalities not have the children called 'Prince' and 'Princess'. Mainly prevents oddities like the ruler being titled 'Prince' and his son also being called 'Prince' which I'm sure was not the case.
duke_feudal_prince = {
	type = character
	gender = male
	tier = kingdom
	special = ruler_child
	flavourization_rules = { 
		top_liege = no
	}
	priority = 50
	
	governments = { feudal_government administrative_government clan_government }
	titles = { k_bavaria k_brittany k_salerno k_hellas k_opolye k_ruthenia k_serbia }
}
duke_feudal_princess = {
	type = character
	gender = female
	tier = kingdom
	special = ruler_child
	flavourization_rules = { 
		top_liege = no
	}
	priority = 50

	governments = { feudal_government administrative_government clan_government }
	titles = { k_bavaria k_brittany k_salerno k_hellas k_opolye k_ruthenia k_serbia }
}

#Brittany Duke
duke_feudal_independent_brittany = {
	type = character
	gender = male
	special = holder
	tier = kingdom
	priority = 156
	name_lists = { name_list_french name_list_english }
	governments = { feudal_government administrative_government clan_government }
	titles = { k_brittany }
}
duke_feudal_independent_female_brittany = {
	type = character
	gender = female
	special = holder
	tier = kingdom
	priority = 156
	name_lists = { name_list_french name_list_english }
	governments = { feudal_government administrative_government clan_government }
	titles = { k_brittany }
}
duchy_feudal_independent_brittany = {
	type = title
	tier = kingdom
	governments = { feudal_government administrative_government clan_government }
	titles = { k_brittany }
	name_lists = { name_list_french name_list_english }
	priority = 156
}

	type = character
	gender = male
	special = holder
	tier = county
	name_lists = { name_list_catalan name_list_occitan }
	de_jure_liege = { k_aquitaine d_gascogne d_languedoc d_berry d_auvergne d_poitou d_limousin d_armagnac d_toulouse d_provence d_gevaudan d_barcelona d_urgell d_catalunya_nova d_barcelona d_urgell d_catalunya_nova  }
	flavourization_rules = { 
		top_liege = no
	}
	priority = 150
}

	tier = barony
	priority = 103
	heritages = { heritage_filipino heritage_sulawesi } # Threw Sulawesi in here since RoA has no Sulawesi flavorization and anything works better than the default
}
baron_feudal_female_tagalog = {
	type = character
	gender = female
	special = holder
	tier = barony
	priority = 103
	heritages = { heritage_filipino heritage_sulawesi }
}
count_feudal_male_tagalog = {
	type = character
	gender = male
	special = holder
	tier = county
	priority = 113
	heritages = { heritage_filipino heritage_sulawesi }
}
count_feudal_female_tagalog = {
	type = character
	gender = female
	special = holder
	tier = county
	priority = 113
	heritages = { heritage_filipino heritage_sulawesi }
}
duke_feudal_male_tagalog = {
	type = character
	gender = male
	special = holder
	tier = duchy
	priority = 123
	heritages = { heritage_filipino heritage_sulawesi }
}

	type = character
	gender = female
	special = holder
	tier = duchy
	priority = 123
	heritages = { heritage_filipino heritage_sulawesi }
}

	tier = kingdom
	priority = 143
	heritages = { heritage_filipino heritage_sulawesi }

	type = character
	gender = male
	special = ruler_child
	tier = kingdom
	priority = 130
	heritages = { heritage_filipino heritage_sulawesi }
	flavourization_rules = {
		top_liege = no
	}
}

	type = character
	gender = female
	special = ruler_child
	tier = kingdom
	priority = 130

		top_liege = no
	}
}
